website_summaries.verdict: Coenzyme Q10 antioxidant supplements are designed to improve overall heart health by preventing oxidative damage and supplying energy and vitality.
pros: Chewable gummy supplement provides 200 milligrams of Coenzyme Q10 per dose
No high-fructose corn syrup, artificial flavors, dairy, or synthetic dyes
Winner of the Chef’s Best Excellence Award for good taste and quality standards
cons: Produced in a facility with some common allergens, so may not be suitable for those with food allergies

customer_reviews.title: GREAT taste!  But watch the quantity/price options; one option seem counter-intuitive.
customer_reviews.text: I love their taste! And I have reordered. But I have two pieces of advice. First, make sure you understand the quantity/dose information. It says "200 milligrams", but that is per serving--and a serving is defined as "two gummy supplements." So, a bottle of 60 actually only contains enough for 30 days. Second--and this one I really don't get--each bottle of 60 sells for $13.31. A different option allows you to buy a "three-pack (60 each bottle) for about $52.00. Do the math: Order 3 individual bottles of 60 (totaling 180 gummies), and pay about $40; or, buy a "3-pack" (totaling 180 gummies) and pay about $12 more.
customer_reviews.author: T. Alisankus

customer_reviews.title: Read up on the research. This isn't a gimmick ...
customer_reviews.text: Read up on the research. This isn't a gimmick item. It's brought my blood pressure down 20 point on the systolic and diastolic. I take 200mg per day, in the morning, on an empty stomach.
customer_reviews.author: J4

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been on blood pressure medication for about 2 years now and still got high readings..I started these along with Turmeric and I've had readings 132/84 and below!! I didn't like the knowing I'd have to take a unnatural pill from now on and so I researched and found that Coq10 and turmeric with bioperine was the herbs to take..I'd recommend it to anyone who has high blood pressure.
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking coq10 for a couple years now and this is my favorite way to get my supplement. These are tasty, soft (I hate the gummies that are hard to chew!), and don’t upset my stomach. They’re also cost effective!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Ordered coq10 twice/both times chill pack gel leaked And both bottles were wet with the gel from pac
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and the chill pack was totally broken and box was even totally saturated and the gel from the chill pack water all over the bottle. I reordered the vitamins and it was again leaking on the vitamin bottle. I want a refund and do not wish to reorder it from you. This needs to be looked into so someone doesn’t get sick
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Delivered Unusable Due to Melting
customer_reviews.text: All the gummies came melted together. Totally unusable. Other reviewer’s mentioned a cool pack that was included, however mine came with nothing in a bubble envelope. Amazon shouldn’t sell these if melting is a problem, which it seems to be. Had to send them back. Lesson learned for me. Never buy soft gummy vitamins online that will probably sit a day or so in some hot usps truck or container waiting to be delivered.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Appreciate the extra effort
customer_reviews.text: My second time ordering this product, the pharmacist and Dr. suggested I use this, but my reason for the 5 stars is, it arrived in a refrigerated box so that the gummies weren't melted in one big lump, I live in Arizona and right now it's really hot!!! they would have been a mess, but thanks for taking time to pack them so they weren't, I appreciate the extra effort, thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Ann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: OMG these are so yummy! I try to find gummies for my supplements because my stomach can't handle so many capsule pills in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Thompson

customer_reviews.title: and these gummies have a great peach flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking CoQ10 as part of a preventive treatment for migraine, and these gummies have a great peach flavor, making it easy to take them in the AM when I may not have a glass of water at hand and is much easier than swallowing a tablet. I have found Amazon to sell them at a lower price than my drugstore, so will continue to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: katarinaism

customer_reviews.title: Has helped stabilize my blood pressure.
customer_reviews.text: These have a pretty good taste, and seem to be very effective. I take them for my blood pressure which has been consistently around 122/79, down from 155/95.
customer_reviews.author: dspeck

customer_reviews.title: My CoQ10 goes down easy.
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking CoQ10 chewables for a long time. More and more I'm converting my supplesments to chewables because I don't have to worry about trying to swallow them. And besides, they taste good.

customer_reviews.title: Nice taste
customer_reviews.text: Easy to chew up.. good for using when you have chicken stuck in your teeth! - more expensive than the pill form.. I use both.. I keep them in the frig so they are a little harder to chew which i prefer.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This is a delicious alternative than taking the pill supplements. Instead of having to take all of my pills, you can eat a variety of delicious gummies that give the same effect. Great for heart health and something I look forward to during vitamin time.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter as part of a supplement regiment she takes for EDS. Some gummy vitamins are gritty and have a bad after taste, but she really likes these. We were pleased & won’t mind buying them again.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious

customer_reviews.title: Unusable

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and a fun way to stay healthy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to chew and swallow but have an odd chemical aftertaste initiall
customer_reviews.text: chemical aftertaste when first having these.This was my first time purchasing this friend so I am in sure if it is down to the brand or seller. I will try one more time perhaps from my local drugstore and then compare.

customer_reviews.text: I have trouble with pills, so I tried these gummies. They have a nice flavor. Only downfall is heat. Living in Phoenix, I need to order more during the winter (lol) to use throughout the year.

They are the best tasting gummy supplements I've ever had and I've tried quite a few. Because of the taste, I look forward to taking them every day. That is definitely a plus.

customer_reviews.title: Gelatenous Mass
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered these several times. This order came in a thermal pack with an "ice" pack...the "ice" pack was hotter than the outside temperature it seemed. Regardless, will probably not order again. I've received refrigerated orders before two-day and NEVER received anything as HOT as this package. Not sure where the failure exists. Gummies are useless now.

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to pills
customer_reviews.text: I get really sick when I take pills. Vitamins are a great alternative. I also take the multivitamins and b12. They taste really good and don't make me throw up like regular vitamin pills. My only complaint - there is a lot of sugar. I would love to see vitafusion use stevia or a healthy sugar alternative. When you take multiple pills, it's almost like eating a starburst for each one in terms of sugar. I would never eat candy everyday. But, I have to take vitamins per doctor's orders and I cannot handle pills.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Melted gummies
customer_reviews.text: The gummies May be good. Mine were melted into one glob. I will be sending it back.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The taste of these gummy Vitamins is superb. I take them for additional heart health.

customer_reviews.title: Best price I have found for Gummies CoQ10
customer_reviews.text: This is the best price I have found for gummies of CoQ10.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor, and the delivery method. Did you know that most hard pills just go through your digestive tract with very little being absorbed out of them? If you buy hard-bound vitamins, you may be flushing your money down the toilet (literally). Do yourself a favor, and use liquid gel caps or gummys. I take CoQ10 for an irregular heartbeat. I notice a difference when I take these and fish oil, daily. In general, I have found VitaFusion products to be a decent quality for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to swallow and taste good
customer_reviews.text: My cardiologist encouraged me to take this. It is very easy to swallow and taste good. Great price for the dosage.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: well, I'm not sure how well they work, was just told with all meds I'm on that you should take this. I do know that at the time I purchased these I was taking so many prescription meds that I chose these gummies so I didnt have to take another pill!! I am NOT a gummy fan however these are so yummy that I got past the gummy texture of these real quick!! Price wise, based upon other prices for this product in pill form I would say the price is reasonable AND I had no hassle & very quick delivery of the product!!!

customer_reviews.title: this is it..

product_meta.title: Vitafusion CoQ10 (Coenzyme Q10) Gummy Vitamins, 200 Mg, 60 Count (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: vitafusion CoQ10 gummy supplements fuse delicious with nutritious. Each serving provides 200 mg of CoQ10. At vitafusion, we believe taste and nutrition can be fused together to deliver the best vitamin experience, ensuring it’s an easy and delicious part of your day. For over 12 years, we’ve been helping people to live happy and healthy lives with our gummy vitamins and supplements. Anything is possible when great nutrition is your foundation. Take a fruitful step toward a healthier, happier world with America’s #1 gummy vitamin brand. Vitamin Better! [1] These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: Free of gluten, high fructose corn syrup, artificial flavors or sweeteners, dairy or synthetic (FD&C) dyes
Recipient of the 2018 ChefsBest Excellence Award. The ChefsBest Excellence Award is awarded to brands that surpass quality standards established by independent professional chefs.
